SEARCH
Package phone

Class Program

java.lang.Object
phone.Program
public class Program extends Object
A class to represent a phone charge program with its associated prices and included features.

  • Constructor Details

    • Program

      public Program(String name, int includedVoiceTime, int includedSMS, int includedData, double fixedPrice, double voiceTimePrice, double smsPrice, double dataPrice)
      Constructs a Program object with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the program
      includedVoiceTime - the number of minutes of voice time included in the program
      includedSMS - the number of SMS included in the program
      includedData - the amount of data usage included in the program, in MB or GB
      fixedPrice - the fixed monthly price of the program
      voiceTimePrice - the price per minute of extra voice time beyond the included amount
      smsPrice - the price per extra SMS beyond the included amount
      dataPrice - the price per extra MB or GB of data usage beyond the included amount
